This is a Markdown document. Text can be ephasized in __bold__ or _italics_.

Bullet lists use a dash:

- item one
- item two
    - sub element

Ordinal lists use a number with period

1. First
3. Second
    - sub-elements can be nested
    - both styles
2. Third
1. Fourth

Code can be written `in-line like this` using back-ticks or

```
in a block of text like this
```
